headline: Here’s Why Mairs & Power Balanced Fund Initiated a Position in WEC Energy Group (WEC)
summary: Mairs & Power, an investment advisor, released the “Mairs & Power Balanced Fund” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The quarter started with tariff uncertainty, conflicts in the Middle East, rising national debt, and the worst start to a year for the dollar; however, it bounced back […]
